title: Futbol Americas: MLS & Liga MX Playoffs Set
description:
On Monday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Sebastian Salazar react to MLS Decision Day and Liga MX play-in round. Who is more likely to fall? They guys also discuss USMNT player performances across Europe. What did Pulisic show Graham Potter after Saturday's performance? Later, we recap the USWNT's 2-1 loss to European champions England and preview their upcoming game against Spain in Pamplona.
